title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
When following the steps in bug report 1GEWMOZ: 
1. Open a new basic project
2. Create a new file named test.xml
3. The default editor used for XML files is the scripted resource editor example
4. Select test.xml in Navigator
5. Choose 'Open With...' and select 'Default Text Editor'
Result: Nothing happens; the scripted resource editor example is still active

Additionally, when searching for an existing open file, the editor types are not considered.

It should open a new editor on the file because the editor type is different.
